ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] twisting 5
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I d say So go play with him.  I ve got reality to attend to. ... I m impressed.  I have an awesome connection, great equipment, and have been playing
ygData.messageBody:
At 08:20 PM 2/13/02 -0800, you wrote:
>OK,
>
>Sitting around with some RL friends who play everquest, and suddenly one of
>them says "by the way, your bard sucks now." "Eh?" I say. "Yeah, we
>played with a bard the other night, 58, who kept 4 songs going most of the
>fight and said when things get tough he twists in a fifth."

I'd say "So go play with him. I've got reality to attend to."

>Is this BS? Or do i really suck. When I have a good connection and low
>lag I keep four going with few drops...

I'm impressed. I have an awesome connection, great equipment, and have
been playing Bard for 3 years now. I still barely manage 4. I prefer 3,
as it lets me think instead of just button mashing, and lots of times, that
think-time lets me adjust my songs on the fly to changing circumstances -
something that 5-song goober probably can't manage. Also remember that
every time he sings a song, he's getting area-effect aggro, so multiply
that times five, and you're probably seeing a bard who abuses the
high-level clerics in his guild.

>I have one song per hotkey, and I hit 1122334411223344...

You're doing just fine. Don't sweat it.


>Raub Zaumbie

Okay - you just lost points there - but we'll forgive you.

Talies the Wanderer
